author: Reuters Editorial
title: Gundlach says breakout in Treasury yields represent 'clear and present danger'
text:
NEW YORK, Feb 23 (Reuters) - Jeffrey Gundlach, chief executive of Doubleline Capital, said Friday that while bonds yields seem to “make sense” at current levels, he has a “low conviction feeling” that they could breakout to the upside, representing a “clear and present danger.”
Gundlach, on CNBC television, said commodities are the best place to be during late-stage economic cycles, which the United States is in at the moment. (Reporting By Jennifer Ablan Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
